name: Mixtape
description:
Made for Dream Diary Jam 2.

Play as a jackalope(?) named Fenrir who has just received a weird mixtape from their best frienemy Faffy. Explore the world it sends you to and collect effects.

Get lost dancing in the dark.

Or something.

Disclaimer: Being as this is a gamejam entry, please do not be surprised by the lack of content. I hope to do better next time.
